migrations.description: Split global configuration files into individual project.json files. This migration has been added automatically to the beginning of your migration set to retroactively make them work with the new version of Nx.
migrations.name: 15-7-0-split-configuration-into-project-json-files

migrations.description: Replace @nx/workspace with @nx/workspace
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Generates a plugin called 'workspace-plugin' containing your workspace generators.
migrations.name: 16-0-0-move-workspace-generators-into-local-plugin

migrations.description: Fix .babelrc presets if it contains an invalid entry for @nx/web/babel.
migrations.name: 16-0-0-fix-invalid-babelrc

migrations.description: Replace @nx/storybook with @nx/storybook
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Update workspace to use Storybook v7
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-migrate-7

migrations.description: Ignore @nx/react/plugins/storybook in Storybook eslint rules.
migrations.name: update-16-1-0

migrations.description: Move .storybook/tsconfig.json to tsconfig.storybook.json for non-Angular projects.
migrations.name: update-16-5-0

migrations.description: Replace @nx/cypress with @nx/cypress
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Normalize tsconfig.cy.json files to be located at '<projectRoot>/cypress/tsconfig.json'
migrations.name: update-16-2-0-normalize-tsconfigs

migrations.description: Remove tsconfig.e2e.json and add settings to project tsconfig.json. tsConfigs executor option is now deprecated. The project level tsconfig.json file should be used instead.
migrations.name: update-16-3-0-remove-old-tsconfigs

migrations.description: Update to Cypress v13. Most noteable change is video recording is off by default. This migration will only update if the workspace is already on Cypress v12. https://docs.cypress.io/guides/references/migration-guide#Migrating-to-Cypress-130
migrations.name: update-16-8-0-cypress-13

migrations.description: Replace @nx/eslint with @nx/eslint
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: update-16-8-0-add-ignored-files
migrations.name: update-16-8-0-add-ignored-files

migrations.description: update-17-0-0-rename-to-eslint
migrations.name: update-17-0-0-rename-to-eslint

migrations.description: Updates for @typescript-utils/utils v6.9.1+
migrations.name: update-typescript-eslint

migrations.description: Update jest configs to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)
migrations.name: update-configs-jest-29

migrations.description: Update jest test files to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)
migrations.name: update-tests-jest-29

migrations.description: Replace @nx/jest with @nx/jest
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Add test-setup.ts to ignored files in production input
migrations.name: add-test-setup-to-inputs-ignore

migrations.description: Move jest executor options to nx.json targetDefaults
migrations.name: move-options-to-target-defaults

migrations.description: Replace @nx/eslint-plugin with @nx/eslint-plugin
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Replace @nx/node with @nx/node
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Replace @nx/node:webpack with @nx/node:webpack
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-update-executor

migrations.description: Replace @nx/node:webpack and @nx/node:webpack with @nx/webpack:webpack for all project targets
migrations.name: update-16-3-1-update-executor

migrations.description: Replace @nx/node:node with @nx/js:node for all project targets
migrations.name: update-16-4-0-replace-node-executor

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~15.2.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-15-2-0

migrations.description: Update the tsconfig.spec.json to use target es2016 for jest-preset-angular v13
migrations.name: update-tsconfig-spec-jest

migrations.description: Update the file-server executor to use @nrwl/web:file-server
migrations.name: update-file-server-executor

migrations.description: Replace the deprecated library generator 'simpleModuleName' option from generator defaults with 'simpleName'
migrations.name: remove-library-generator-simple-module-name-option

migrations.description: Replace @nx/angular with @nx/angular
migrations.name: update-16-0-0-add-nx-packages

migrations.description: Remove protractor as default e2eTestRunner from nxJson and project configurations
migrations.name: remove-protractor-defaults-from-generators

migrations.description: Remove karma as default unitTestRunner from nxJson and project configurations
migrations.name: remove-karma-defaults-from-generators

migrations.description: Remove exported `@angular/platform-server` `renderModule` method. The `renderModule` method is now exported by the Angular CLI.
migrations.name: remove-render-module-platform-server-exports

migrations.description: Remove 'ngcc' invocation if exists from the 'postinstall' script in package.json.
migrations.name: remove-ngcc-invocation

migrations.description: Extract the app config for standalone apps
migrations.name: extract-app-config-for-standalone

migrations.description: Update server executors' configuration to disable 'buildOptimizer' for non optimized builds.
migrations.name: update-server-executor-config

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~16.0.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-16-0-0

migrations.description: Remove the 'accessibility-' prefix from '@angular-eslint/eslint-plugin-template' rules.
migrations.name: rename-angular-eslint-accesibility-rules

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~16.1.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-16-1-0

migrations.description: Explicitly set 'updateBuildableProjectDepsInPackageJson' to 'true' in targets that rely on that value as the default.
migrations.name: explicitly-set-projects-to-update-buildable-deps

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~16.2.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-16-2-0

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~17.0.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-17-0-0

migrations.description: Rename 'browserTarget' to 'buildTarget'.
migrations.name: rename-browser-target-to-build-target

migrations.description: Replace usages of '@nguniversal/builders' with '@angular-devkit/build-angular'.
migrations.name: replace-nguniversal-builders

migrations.description: Replace usages of '@nguniversal/' packages with '@angular/ssr'.
migrations.name: replace-nguniversal-engines

migrations.description: Replace the deep imports from 'zone.js/dist/zone' and 'zone.js/dist/zone-testing' with 'zone.js' and 'zone.js/testing'.
migrations.name: update-zone-js-deep-import

migrations.description: Angular v17 introduces a new control flow syntax that uses the @ and } characters. This migration replaces the existing usages with their corresponding HTML entities.
migrations.name: block-template-entities

migrations.description: CompilerOption.useJit and CompilerOption.missingTranslation are unused under Ivy. This migration removes their usage
migrations.name: migration-v17-compiler-options

migrations.description: Updates `TransferState`, `makeStateKey`, `StateKey` imports from `@angular/platform-browser` to `@angular/core`.
migrations.name: migration-transfer-state

migrations.description: Updates the Angular CDK to v17
migrations.name: migration-v17
